## surfaceNormal variable

Inline function. Multiplies `normal` with given 4x4 normal matrix (e.g. transpose inverse of view \* model).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
surfaceNormal: (n: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"vec3">, normalMat: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"mat4">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").FnCall<"vec3">
```
